description: Chemical factory fire in GIDC phase 2. 4 fire tenders deployed.
Minor scuffle outside polling booth during Lok Sabha voting.
River crossed danger mark (26 ft). Low lying areas inundated.
Water logging in societies due to heavy overnight rain.
Large cave-in observed near Akshar Chowk due to drainage leak.
Cholera cases reported due to sewage mixing in water line.
Old tree fell on parked cars during pre-monsoon storm.
Flash flood in Motnath Mahadev area.
Truck breakdown caused 3km jam for 4 hours.
